q: In jQuery, which of the following methods is used for zero-based index, counting backwards from the last element?

Which of these is the selector in the following jQuery code: 

$('p').css('color','red');
What does the selector $("p~ul") depict in jQuery?

a.option:
Selects all elements matched by
    that follow a children element matched by

Selects all elements matched by
    that follow a parent element matched by

Selects all elements matched by
    that follow a sibling element matched by

Selects all elements matched by
    that follow a descendant element matched by

q: Which of the following selectors is used to select all the elements having no children in jQuery?
Which of the following is the correct syntax for fetching the value of an attribute from an element in jQuery?
How many types of selectors are present in JQuery?

What is the output of the following jQuery code:

<html lang="en"> 
    <body>
        <ul> 
            <li>10</li> 
            <li>20</li> 
            <li>30</li> 
            <li>40</li> 
            <li>50</li> 
        </ul> 
        <ul> 
            <li>10</li> 
            <li>20</li> 
            <li>30</li> 
            <li>40</li>
            <li>50</li> 
        </ul> 
        <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js">
        </script> 
        <script> (function ($) { 
            alert($('li:nth-child(2n)').text());  
        })(jQuery); </script> 
    </body> 
</html>

What is the output of the following jQuery code:

<html lang="en"> 
    <body>
        <ul> 
            <li>10</li> 
            <li>20</li> 
            <li>30</li> 
            <li>40</li> 
            <li>50</li> 
        </ul> 
        <ul> 
            <li>10</li> 
            <li>20</li> 
            <li>30</li> 
            <li>40</li>
            <li>50</li> 
        </ul> 
        <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js">
        </script> 
        <script> (function ($) { 
            alert($('li:nth-child(odd)').text());  
        })(jQuery); </script> 
    </body> 
</html>

What is the output of the following jQuery code:

<html lang="en"> 
    <body>
        <ul> 
            <li>10</li> 
            <li>20</li> 
            <li>30</li> 
            <li>40</li> 
            <li>50</li> 
            <li>60</li> 
            <li>70</li> 
            <li>80</li> 
            <li>90</li> 
            <li>100</li> 
        </ul> 
        <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js">
        </script> 
        <script> (function ($) { 
            alert($('li:nth-child(0)').text());  
        })(jQuery); </script> 
    </body> 
</html>
